expansionContent:PrepareDivider.NAME: Prepare: Divide
expansionContent:PrepareDivider.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:PrepareDivider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
expansionContent:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL This card's damage is equal to 1/10th of your current HP. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:Hexaburn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL This card's damage is equal to 1/6th of your current HP. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:ChargeUp.NAME: Hexaburn
expansionContent:ChargeUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL This card's damage is equal to 1/6th of your current HP. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:DefensiveMode.NAME: Hexaburn
expansionContent:DefensiveMode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL This card's damage is equal to 1/6th of your current HP. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:PrepareBeam.NAME: Prepare: Beam
expansionContent:PrepareBeam.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:PrepareBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:SlimeBeam.NAME: Slime Beam
expansionContent:SlimeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:Flail.NAME: Flail
expansionContent:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
expansionContent:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn.

expansionContent:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
expansionContent:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
expansionContent:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain !M! Strength, or !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Strength if you are below half HP. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:Collect.NAME: Collect
expansionContent:Collect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and 1 Potency. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
expansionContent:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies and remove all of their Block. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:OozeBath.NAME: Ooze Bath
expansionContent:OozeBath.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Goop. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:OozeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Poison and Goop. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:CaCaw.NAME: CA-CAW!
expansionContent:CaCaw.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Awakened One. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:DarkVoid.NAME: Dark Void
expansionContent:DarkVoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. The next time each enemy does not Attack on their turn, gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:TimeRipple.NAME: Time Ripple
expansionContent:TimeRipple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:HeadSlam.NAME: Head Slam
expansionContent:HeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage if the enemy is a Boss. If not, Stun them. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:ManipulateTime.NAME: Manipulate Time
expansionContent:ManipulateTime.DESCRIPTION: Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:ManipulateTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:DonusPower.NAME: Donu's Power
expansionContent:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:DecasProtection.NAME: Deca's Protection
expansionContent:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
expansionContent:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:Sear.NAME: Sear
expansionContent:Sear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage every turn this combat. NL Exhaust.

expansionContent:StudyAutomaton.NAME: Study Automaton
expansionContent:StudyAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Automaton card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Automaton card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
expansionContent:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.

expansionContent:StudyAwakened.NAME: Study Awakened
expansionContent:StudyAwakened.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Awakened One card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyAwakened.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Awakened One card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyChamp.NAME: Study the Champ
expansionContent:StudyChamp.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Champ card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyChamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Champ card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyCollector.NAME: Study Collector
expansionContent:StudyCollector.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Collector card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyCollector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Collector card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyGuardian.NAME: Study Guardian
expansionContent:StudyGuardian.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Guardian card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyGuardian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Guardian card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyHexaghost.NAME: Study Hexaghost
expansionContent:StudyHexaghost.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Hexaghost card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyHexaghost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Hexaghost card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyShapes.NAME: Study Donu & Deca
expansionContent:StudyShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Donu & Deca card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Donu & Deca card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:StudyTimeEater.NAME: Study Time Eater
expansionContent:StudyTimeEater.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Time Eater card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
expansionContent:StudyTimeEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Time Eater card to your hand at the start of each turn.

expansionContent:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
expansionContent:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
expansionContent:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random Spire_Boss cards to your hand. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
